attributes.action: to return test cricket in England to the "A- list" of sporting events covered on terrestrial television.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In August 2005 8.4m people watched test cricket live on Channel 4. Sky's viewing figures are usually less than a tenth of  this. 

We believe that forcing people to pay to watch cricket will have a devastating long term effect on the game's future and that that some live coverage should be available as soon as possible free-to-air.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
